title: Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). tamRgo: Digital Pets R. https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo/, https://github.com/matt-dray/tamRgo.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tamRgo: Digital Pets for R},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo/, https://github.com/matt-dray/tamRgo}, }

title: Digital Pets for R
text: Tamago (egg) + uotchi (‘watch’) = Tamagotchi. Tamago + R = {tamRgo}. concept R package saves digital pet computer persists sessions whose stats update time. can interact pet R console.

title: Digital Pets for R
text: Install {tamRgo} GitHub. package dependencies, need R version 4 higher. Basic instructions appear attach package.
code: install.packages("remotes")  # if not yet installed remotes::install_github("matt-dray/tamRgo") library(tamRgo) # Welcome to {tamRgo}, a digital pet in the R console! #  - Docs: <https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo> #  - New pet: lay_egg() #  - Then: get_stats(), see_pet(), play(), feed(), clean()

title: Digital Pets for R
text: First, simply lay egg. ‘blueprint’ pet saved computer. can print pet’s stats console. , sweet little KEVIN. pet’s stats update time, even aren’t paying attention. can play() , feed() clean() pet improve status. Interact pet accumulate (hidden) experience points help level , change appearance , apparently, extend life somehow. may release_pet() feel time right, erase blueprint computer. Fare thee well, sweet KEVIN.
code: lay_egg(pet_name = "KEVIN") # Save pet blueprint? y/n: y # Saved pet blueprint. # You have a new egg... it hatched! # See its stats with get_stats() see_stats() # Characteristics #   Name:    KEVIN #   Species: Z #   Age:     0 #   Level:   0 (newborn) #   Alive:   TRUE # Status #   Happy:  ■■■□□  #   Hungry: ■■■□□ #   Dirty:  □□□□□ see_pet() # ░░░░░░░ # ░░███░░ # ░█░█░█░ # ░█████░ # ░██░██░ # ░░███░░ # ░░░░░░░

title: Digital Pets for R
text: package’s key mechanism persistent storage ‘blueprint’, RDS file containing list pet-related values, saved path resolved tools::R_user_dir("tamRgo", = "data"). values blueprint updated player interacts pet, given time ’s elapsed since last interaction. gives appearance pet lives ‘real time’.

title: Clean Your Pet — clean
text: Clean dirt pet, reduces pet's 'dirty' status value 1, minimum 0.

title: Clean Your Pet — clean
text: Nothing.

title: Feed Your Pet — feed
text: Give food pet, reduces pet's 'hungry' status value 1, minimum 0.

title: Feed Your Pet — feed
text: Nothing.

title: Print Pet Statistics — get_stats
text: Print console pet's current characteristics status values.

title: Print Pet Statistics — get_stats
text: Nothing.

title: Print Pet Statistics — get_stats
text: output show following elements: Name Pet's user-provided name. Species Randomly-selected pet species. Age Days since born. Level Growth stage. Alive pet alive? Happy Happiness scale 0 5. Hungry Hunger scale 0 5. Dirty Dirtiness scale 0 5.

title: Generate a New Pet — lay_egg
text: Lays egg contains new digital pet live computer.

title: Generate a New Pet — lay_egg
text: pet_name Character. name new pet. Maximum eight characters.

title: Generate a New Pet — lay_egg
text: Nothing.

title: Generate a New Pet — lay_egg
text: persistent 'blueprint' file pet's characteristics saved computer. saved RDS directory location given tools::R_user_dir("tamRgo", = "data"). can store one blueprint time, can one pet time computer. .

title: Play with Your Pet — play
text: Play game chance pet, increases pet's 'happy' status value 1, maximum 5.

title: Play with Your Pet — play
text: Nothing.

title: Release Your Pet — release
text: Release pet world. released, gone forever.

title: Release Your Pet — release
text: Nothing.

title: Release Your Pet — release
text: Deletes persistent 'blueprint' file pet's characteristics saved RDS directory location given tools::R_user_dir("tamRgo", = "data").

title: See Your Pet — see_pet
text: Print console image digital pet.

title: See Your Pet — see_pet
text: Nothing.

title: See Your Pet — see_pet
text: appearance pet dependent species level, can view get_stats.

what: tamRgo: Digital Pets for R — tamRgo-package
title: tamRgo: Digital Pets for R — tamRgo-package
text: Store persistent digital pet computer interact R console.

title: tamRgo: Digital Pets for R — tamRgo-package
text: Maintainer: Matt Dray mwdray@gmail.com contributors: Adriana De Palma [contributor]

title: tamRgo 0.1.0
text: Finalised unalive logic (#38, #39), sprites. mild code refactor easier reading. Updated README.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9007
text: Used concept ‘XP freeze’ certain age given internal; chance unalive dependent freeze value number days since age reached (#23). Adjusted passive XP accumulation (#24). Added alert user pet levels . Created internal dataset internal, containing $sprites $constants single source truth level thresholds, age XP freeze, etc. Added chance-based minigame play() function. Corrected updated exported-function documentation. Corrected unalive logic.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9006
text: Added simple draft unalive logic (towards #23). Re-instigated concept ‘dirty’. Added warning get_stats() status bars reached maximum negative score. Added check_blueprint utils.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9005
text: Allowed fourth level, stage pet can become unalive (towards #23). Added common images level 4 unalive (towards #23). Removed ‘dirty’ concept simplificiation.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9004
text: Simplified output get_stats() included ‘bars’ status values. Added graphics species X, Y Z levels 0 (shared), 1, 2 3 (#10).

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9003
text: Added list placeholder ‘graphics’ internal data, methods call (.e. .get_pet_matrix()) print (.e. .draw_pet()), wrapped exported function see_pet() (towards #10). Added simple system levelling .update_xp() (towards #9, #24). see_stats() renamed get_stats()

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9002
text: Added play(), feed() clean() functions altering pet’s status values. Set Depends R (>= 4.0).

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9001
text: Shifted focus fully local experience (#20). Added internal functions .create_, .write_, .read_ .update_blueprint()s. Introduced time-dependent blueprint updates (toward #9). Added exported functions lay_egg(), see_stats() release_pet(). Added startup message (#6). Updated README DESCRIPTION. Added NEWS file track changes.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package, README, license, sample data, {pkgdown} website, low-level user-facing functions. Developed first attempt function architecture, leant heavily GitHub gists storing pet blueprints remotely.
